name: Error Rate Spike Investigation Strategy
description: Leverage this investigation strategy in case of unexpected spike in error rates for a service.

steps.notes: Check for increased `errors` in downstream services to determine if they are the source or simply affected by upstream issues.
Analyze `topic_level_message_count` to evaluate upstream broker health.
Assess `CPU`, `memory`, and `disk` utilization to evaluate broker health.
Examine `CPU`, `memory`, and `disk` usage metrics to check for Database performance.
Evaluate `CPU` usage, `hit rate`, `memory`, and `disk` metrics in Redis.
